item.title: 基斯通石油管道关闭，期货走高
item.description: TC Energy Corp 的 Keystone 输油管道将加拿大重质原油输送到美国中西部和墨西哥湾沿岸，该输油管道周四部分关闭，导致石油期货在结算后交易中走高。【原文：TC Energy Corp’s Keystone oil pipeline, which transports heavy Canadian crude to the US Midwest and Gulf Coast, partially shut Thursday, sending oil futures higher in post-settlement trading.】

item.title: S&P 指数失误引发摩根士丹利和 PNC 神秘波动
item.description: 在 S&P Global 出现罕见失误后，美国几家最大银行的股价最近几天出现了不同寻常的走势。【原文：Shares of some of the biggest US banks went on an unusual ride in recent days after a rare S&P Global blunder.】

item.title: 财报显示扭亏为盈，Gap 跳涨
item.description: Gap Inc. 公布的第四季度盈利超出预期，这表明这家历史悠久的服装零售商扭亏为盈的努力正在取得成效。【原文：Gap Inc. rose after reporting fourth-quarter earnings that exceeded expectations, a sign that efforts to turn the storied apparel retailer around are bearing fruit.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会推迟就比特币 ETF 现货期权交易做出决定

item.title: 美国小型企业即使债务负担沉重仍保持乐观
item.description: 美联储的一项最新调查显示，尽管债务负担加重和高借贷利率限制了小型企业获得新的信贷，但美国小型企业对2024年的前景依然乐观。【原文：Small businesses in the US remained upbeat in their outlook for 2024 despite elevated debt burdens and high borrowing rates that limited their access to new credit, a new Federal Reserve survey showed.】

item.title: 埃弗顿未来所有者 777 Partners 因资产转让面临诉讼

item.title: YPF 称出售石油可腾出 8 亿美元用于页岩油开采
item.description: 阿根廷最大的石油和天然气生产商、国营伊石油公司（YPF SA）表示，其剥离老化油田的全面计划将释放出数亿美元的资金，用于投资其在备受瞩目的瓦卡穆埃尔塔（Vaca Muerta）地层的页岩开采项目。【原文：Argentina’s biggest oil and gas producer, state-run YPF SA, said its sweeping plan to divest aging oil fields will free up hundreds of millions of dollars to invest in its shale push in the heralded Vaca Muerta formation.】

Like Hamas, the Houthis are hostile to Israel and backed by Iran. The rebels have disrupted traffic in the Red Sea by repeatedly attacking ships there, and they’ve attempted to strike Israel with missiles and drones. They’ve said they’re targeting Israel-linked vessels in the Red Sea, though ships with no such direct connection have been】

item.title: 金多斯称欧洲央行正密切关注商业地产
item.description: 2023 年 3 月 16 日星期四，在德国法兰克福举行的利率决议新闻发布会上，欧洲中央银行（ECB）副总裁路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）。欧洲央行继续按计划将利率上调半个百分点，但对随后可能采取的行动保持沉默，因为市场动荡令瑞士信贷集团（Credit Suisse Group AG）感到不安。摄影师：亚历克斯-克劳斯/布鲁姆伯格【原文：Luis de Guindos, vice president of the European Central Bank (ECB), at a rates decision news conference in Frankfurt, Germany, on Thursday, March 16, 2023. Photographer: Alex Kraus/Bloomberg】

item.title: 印度禁止 JM Financial 管理公共债务问题
item.description: 根据印度证券交易委员会通过的初步命令，印度资本市场监管机构已禁止 JM 金融服务有限公司担任印度公司任何公开发行债务的管理人，原因是该公司涉嫌存在不公平交易行为和违反商业银行行为准则。【原文：India’s capital market regulator has barred JM Financial Services Ltd. from acting as a manager for any public issues of debt by Indian companies on account of alleged unfair trade practices and violation of code of conduct for merchant bankers, according to an initial order passed by the Securities and Exchange Board of India.】
